meanings.definition: Yellowwares: pottery or earthenware that is yellow in color.
meanings.sent1: I saw beautiful yellowwares displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen shelves were filled with various yellowwares.
meanings.sent3: The yellowwares on the table seemed to glow in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of yellowwares brightened up the room like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The artisan crafted the yellowwares with great care and skill.

meanings.definition: Yellowwares: items made from yellow pottery or earthenware.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop had a wide selection of yellowwares for sale.
meanings.sent2: She collected yellowwares from different parts of the world.
meanings.sent3: The yellowwares in the store window caught the attention of passersby.
meanings.sent4: The yellowwares in the kitchen cupboard added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling unique yellowwares.
